psychographics.lifestyle: A busy, intellectually driven lifestyle centered around academic research and personal interests. He balances a demanding academic schedule with outdoor activities and a desire for self-improvement.

shopping_behavior.search_behavior: He primarily relies on recommendations from sources like Little Red Book and actively seeks reviews with images. He is cautious about sponsored products, particularly if they appear on frequently purchased items.
